answers.author: Michael Embury
answers.text:
North Kingstown does charge for EMS runs.  A private firm bills insurance companies for a run; keeps 6% collected and the remainder of the funds are placed in a special fund to be used for purchasing fire equipment.

author: Ashley Jacobs
text:
These questions are for counties that provide fire service.  
1.  Do you levy a tax for fire service, and if so, is it placed in a Special Revenue Fund?
2.  Does your fire millage completely cover the cost of fire service, or is fire supplemented by the General Fund?
3. Have you issued General Obligation bonds to purchase 800MHz radios?
title: Funding Fire Service
